task.title: Generate Administrator Credentials
task.shortdesc: Now that you have installed and configured Eucalyptus, you're ready to start using it. To do so, you must generate credentials.

context.note: When you run the euca_conf --get-credentials command, you are requesting the access and secret keys and an X.509 certificate and key. You cannot retrieve an existing X.509 certificate and key. You can only generate a new pair.
context.p: To generate a set of credentials:

taskbody.result: You are now able to run Eucalyptus commands.
